Race.SpecificTitle: Councilman -- District 1, City of Bossier City
Town of Plain Dealing Prop. No. 1 of 5 -- Wet/Dry-6%PkgAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText: Town of Plain Dealing Proposition No. 1 of 5
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume be permitted by package only and not for consumption on the premises in the Town of Plain Dealing, Bossier Parish, Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Plain Dealing Prop. No. 2 of 5 -- Wet/Dry-6%ConAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText: Town of Plain Dealing Proposition No. 2 of 5
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Town of Plain Dealing, Bossier Parish, Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Plain Dealing Prop. No. 3 of 5 -- Wet/Dry-1/2%ConAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText: Town of Plain Dealing Proposition No. 3 of 5
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverage alcohol containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Town of Plain Dealing, Bossier Parish, Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Plain Dealing Prop. No. 4 of 5 -- Wet/Dry-1/2%PkgAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText: Town of Plain Dealing Proposition No. 4 of 5
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above by the package only and not for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Town of Plain Dealing, Bossier Parish, Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Plain Dealing Prop. No. 5 of 5 -- Wet/Dry-Restaurant - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText: Town of Plain Dealing Proposition No. 5 of 5
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of high and low alcoholic content be permitted only on the premises of restaurant establishments which have been issued an "R" permit as defined by law in the Town of Plain Dealing, Bossier Parish, Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Benton Fire District No. 4 -- 2 Mills - BOC - 15 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Benton Fire District No. 4 of the Parish of Bossier, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy and collect a special tax of two (2) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $389,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of fifteen (15) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2036, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating fire protection and emergency medical service facilities, vehicles and equipment, including both movable and immovable property, that are to be used to provide fire protection and medical service in the District, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes and salaries of firemen, and all purposes incidental thereto?
